text:
@realDonaldTrump U r so afraid 2 lose in Novrmber.
The coronavirus is going 2 stop ur corrupt Chinese & Russian hackers from rigging the election, because they can't "fix" mail-in ballots, 4 u, that have a paper trail, receipts & copies, as proof.
Now u're trying 2 tell us THEY'RE rigged?
